mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY IMG_ORDER ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MARK" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT M1.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M1.PROFILE_IMG FROM STORY S1 JOIN MEMBER M1 ON (S1.MEMBER_NO = M1.MEMBER_NO) WHERE S1.STORY_DEL_FL = 'N' AND S1.CREATED_AT > CURRENT_DATE - 1 AND M1.MEMBER_NO IN ( SELECT FOLLOWER_MEMBER FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER = #{memberNo} ) GROUP BY M1.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M1.PROFILE_IMG ORDER BY M1.MEMBER_NICKNAME
SELECT FOLLOWER_MEMBER FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER = #{memberNo} AND CONFIRM = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B WHERE B.MEMBER_NO IN ( SELECT FOLLOWER_MEMBER FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER = #{memberNo} AND CONFIRM = 1) AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC) AS "RNUM", BOARD_NO, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') AS "COMMENT_COUNT",
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS "LIKE_COUNT",
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L2 WHERE B.BOARD_NO = L2.BOARD_NO AND L2.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AS "LIKE_CHECK",
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MARK" M2 WHERE B.BOARD_NO = M2.BOARD_NO AND M2.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AS "MARK_CHECK",
CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE - B.CREATED_AT < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - B.CREATED_AT) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - B.CREATED_AT < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - B.CREATED_AT) * 24 * 60 ) || '분 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - B.CREATED_AT < 1 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - B.CREATED_AT) * 24 ) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
END AS "CREATED_AT"
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_NO IN ( SELECT FOLLOWER_MEMBER
FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER = #{memberNo} AND CONFIRM = 1) ORDER BY RNUM DESC
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER MM WHERE MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = 1 AND MEMBER_NO NOT IN ( SELECT FOLLOWER_MEMBER FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER = #{memberNo})
